CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit Search Graph API
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit Search Graph API
OldVersion.description: ,Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for meeting participants to edit their display name
CurrentVersion.description: Teams meeting participants will be able to edit their display name, enabling more flexibility in their meeting presence, regardless of their tenant set display name. Users can make this change during the meeting and it will persist throughout the duration of the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for meeting participants to edit their display name
OldVersion.description: Teams meeting participants will be able to edit their display name, enabling more flexibility in their meeting presence, regardless of their tenant set display name. Users can make this change during the meeting and it will persist throughout the duration of the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Language selection for users
CurrentVersion.description: Users can select their preferred language within the Viva learning Setting Menu, independent of Teams or Browser language. Preferred language will be persisted across all Viva Learning Surfaces.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Language selection for users
OldVersion.description: Users can select their preferred language within the Viva learning Setting Menu, independent of Teams or Browser language. Preferred language will be persisted across all Viva Learning Surfaces.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - Audit Search Graph API
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - Audit Search Graph API
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Support joining a live event as an attendee for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Rooms on Windows can now join a live event as an attendee and watch the streaming experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Support joining a live event as an attendee for Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description: Teams Rooms on Windows can now join a live event as an attendee and watch the streaming experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for transcript-only meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap will support meetings with only transcript enabled, and without recording enabled. In the case when only transcript is enabled for a meeting, the features from intelligent recap that users can access are AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for transcript-only meetings (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Intelligent recap will support meetings with only transcript enabled, and without recording enabled. In the case when only transcript is enabled for a meeting, the features from intelligent recap that users can access are AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Enriched Data Loss Prevention Alert Email Notifications for DLP Admins
CurrentVersion.description: ,There is now increased information in the alert email notification sent to the Data Loss Prevention (DLP) admin upon a DLP policy match. Previously a DLP alert email only included the user activity and the type of sensitive information matched in the alert. Now, DLP admins will get additional context such as alert ID, policy details, device details, and more. This will help admins quickly assess the priority of an alert and determine the next steps before navigating to the Microsoft Purview DLP alerts page or Microsoft 365 Defender DLP alerts page.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Enriched Data Loss Prevention Alert Email Notifications for DLP Admins
OldVersion.description: ,There is now increased information in the alert email notification sent to the Data Loss Prevention (DLP) admin upon a DLP policy match. Previously a DLP alert email only included the user activity and the type of sensitive information matched in the alert. Now, DLP admins will get additional context such as alert ID, policy details, device details, and more. This will help admins quickly assess the priority of an alert and determine the next steps before navigating to the Microsoft Purview DLP alerts page or Microsoft 365 Defender DLP alerts page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot for Microsoft 365 in Teams chat on mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to easily access Copilot on the Teams mobile app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot for Microsoft 365 in Teams chat on mobile
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to easily access Copilot on the Teams mobile app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Shared mailbox support security group assignments on encrypted mail access in Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Members in mail-enabled security group that are assigned to a shared mailbox can access encrypted mail directly using Outlook for Windows. Users can access encrypted mail with Do Not Forward or Encrypt-only protection.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Premium Content Query - Columns in new libraries are queryable
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, columns in newly created libraries by licensed users are all made available to content query. Also, users can trigger an action to make all columns in existing libraries available to content query.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Image background removal in Clipchamp
CurrentVersion.description: ,You can remove a background from your image and photos using AI.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie –  Integrating Apple's Push to Talk framework on iOS
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Walkie-Talkie on iOS will be integrated with Apple's Push-to-Talk (PTT) framework to enhance communication and convenience of transmitting audio from anywhere on their phone, even when Teams is not in the foreground. It enables audio transmission directly from the lock screen and comes with background runtime optimization for optimal performance while conserving battery life.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Browser-optimized playback for SAP SuccessFactors content
CurrentVersion.description: Desktop client content consumption for SuccessFactors content is enhanced with browser optimized playback.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Browser-optimized playback for SAP SuccessFactors content
OldVersion.description: Desktop client content consumption for SuccessFactors content is enhanced with browser optimized playback.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent message translation in chats
CurrentVersion.description: When you get a message in a different language, you will see translation suggested to help you understand it better. In the settings, you can select which languages you don't want to translate, and whether to translate messages automatically.
